keyMoments.title: Execute Plan to Cut Down Giant Jack
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats work together following Nami's plan to cut down Giant Jack from the west, allowing Luffy to reach Enel.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's coordination and trust in Nami's strategic planning.

keyMoments.title: Luffy and Nami Approach Final Battle
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Nami ride the waver up the falling Giant Jack toward Enel's Ark Maxim for the final confrontation.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the climactic battle that will determine the fate of Skypiea.

keyMoments.title: Understanding with Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Wyper learns from Robin about Luffy's true motivation to ring the bell, creating an alliance between the Shandia and the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Transforms the Shandia from antagonists to allies in the fight against Enel.

keyMoments.title: Wyper's Sacrifice to Fell Giant Jack
keyMoments.description: Wyper uses his Reject Dial despite being critically wounded, helping to topple Giant Jack and enable Luffy's path to Enel.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Shandia's commitment to their ancestral mission and their newfound trust in the Straw Hats.
